main event: A sighting of an unidentified object reported by a pilot at Otis AFB, Massachusetts in July 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to be maneuvering rapidly and climbing to approximately 22,000 feet., The sighting lasted for 9 minutes., The pilot observed that something appeared to be hanging from the object., It was concluded by weather officers and the reporting pilot that the object was likely a weather pilot balloon., The report was part of a larger investigation by Project Blue Book.
